Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/5e37da3aa64def9f6fc5287dd24e070a/tumblr_inline_ny34jbWnCc1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="800" data-orig-width="600"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/2aefb4858cb7c6da51fee1a73d726c66/tumblr_inline_ny34k66r0H1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="800" data-orig-width="600"/></figure><p>HolidayPony armed <a href="http://www.deviantart.com/art/Satelite-Launch-570546659">this sketch </a>with a few pencils, an eraser and a sharpener. #KSP </p>
That's pretty cool, except he didn't recreate the "confetti" style fairings. :(

I prefer those "clamshell" fairings anyway. There's a mod for that.

Real nice work, HolidayPony! Especially the curly exhaust. I love the crowd of broken / disoriented satellites in the background. That cracked me up.
UFO on the bottom right spotted :cool:

[quote name='Thourion']UFO on the bottom right spotted :cool:[/QUOTE]

THE MUN LANDINGS WERE FAKED etc.
sore point with me... I had a thread about KSP conspiracies and the thread was locked.... there is a conspiracy about discussing KSP conspiracies it seems.... :)
